questions.question: What is the predominant color of the visible exterior surfaces of this piece of furniture?

What is the overall geometric shape of the main storage component of this item?

Judging by the visible legs, what is the style of the leg design?

What is the material that appears to make up the majority of the visible construction?
Describe the shape and style of the visible feet or base of the furniture piece.
What is the apparent color of the visible legs or base in comparison to the main body?
What type of visible hardware is noticeably present on the drawer?
Considering the grain, what is the apparent direction of the wood grain on the main body?

What is the overall visual style of this item, simple or ornate?
What is the visible height of the furniture relative to its width and depth?
What is the apparent level of visible distressing or wear and tear?
